step_feedback.feedback: Good job sitting or standing comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You are placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
Great job inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Visualize fluid moving to your chest as you breathe.
Excellent exhale through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out to complete the breath.
Good start for the second repetition. Ensure you are sitting or standing comfortably and have your hands on your abdomen.
You are placing your hands on your abdomen. Continue to inhale slowly through your nose while tightening your whole body muscles.
Well done inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Keep visualizing the fluid moving towards your chest.
Perfect exhale through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out to complete this deep breathing exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose, tighten your muscles, and visualize fluid moving to your chest. Then, exhale through your mouth, relax, and visualize pushing fluid out. This helps stimulate lymphatic drainage.
